thread.title: Alabama freshman quarterback in the hospital
thread.title_full: Alabama freshman quarterback in the hospital | AL.com

author: Matt Zenitz | mzenitz@al.com
title: Alabama freshman quarterback in the hospital
text:
Alabama freshman quarterback Blake Barnett has been in the hospital since Monday, according to posts from Barnett on Instagram and Snapchat.
Barnett has had multiple posts on both sites highlighting the process, including one on Snapchat Tuesday saying he had undergone multiple blood transfusions.
Barnett was one of the prized members of the Tide's most recent recruiting class.
Alabama declined to comment.
